title: Darius
body: {{champion:122}} Fucking love this rework. free elo machine.

replies.body:
Man I main Darius, People just don't know how easy it is to beat him. 

First don't dive him under his tower, unless he's super low. He can heal off you and keep you under the tower. 
He'll Q you than E you so you can't hit him again and finally w to stop you from running out.


Force him to miss his Q so he'll push lane, he's easy as hell to gank.  Hit and run style of game play pisses him off,  Gank him if he over extends.

If you chase low health Darius into a bush he's waiting for his Q to get off Cool down to heal back up and turn it around, stay away from the bush and try to use a skill shot into it if you can instead.


His Passive is op, don't try to all in him at level 1 I can't tell you how many times people thought they could win because they had ignite.

That +5 stack of bleed is no joke that's 45 damage a sec for 5 secs that gets refreshed every time he hits you.
i love any champ that counters riven

Because people don't now how to play vs him and let him stack passive 5 times. He wins hard vs allin teams, and looses hard vs poke teams. There is no middle ground with this guy. And  an you guess witch teams are more common?
